scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:run && npm run test:coverage:summary
scripts.test:coverage:summary:
echo '
📊 ARCHON TEST & COVERAGE SUMMARY
═══════════════════════════════════════
' && node -e "try { const data = JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('coverage/test-results.json', 'utf8')); const passed = data.numPassedTests; const failed = data.numFailedTests; const total = data.numTotalTests; const duration = Math.round(data.testResults.reduce((a,b) => a + (b.perfStats?.runtime || 0), 0)/1000); console.log('🎯 TEST RESULTS:'); console.log('   ✅ Passed:', passed, '(' + Math.round(passed/total*100) + '%)'); console.log('   ❌ Failed:', failed, '(' + Math.round(failed/total*100) + '%)'); console.log('   📊 Total Tests:', total); console.log('   ⏱️  Duration:', duration + 's'); console.log('
📈 TOP ERROR CATEGORIES:'); const errors = {}; data.testResults.forEach(file => { if (file.message) { const lines = file.message.split('
'); lines.forEach(line => { if (line.includes('No "') && line.includes('export is defined')) { const match = line.match(/No "([^"]+)"/); if (match) errors[match[1] + ' icon missing'] = (errors[match[1] + ' icon missing'] || 0) + 1; } else if (line.includes('mockReturnValue is not a function')) { errors['Toast mock pattern'] = (errors['Toast mock pattern'] || 0) + 1; } else if (line.includes('border-')) { errors['CSS class mismatch'] = (errors['CSS class mismatch'] || 0) + 1; } }); } }); Object.entries(errors).sort((a,b) => b[1] - a[1]).slice(0,5).forEach(([err, count]) => console.log('   🐛', err + ':', count)); } catch(e) { console.log('❌ Test results not available'); }" && echo '
📋 COVERAGE STATUS:' && (test -f coverage/coverage-summary.json && node -e "const cov = JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('coverage/coverage-summary.json', 'utf8')); const total = cov.total; console.log('   📊 Lines:', total.lines.pct + '%', '(' + total.lines.covered + '/' + total.lines.total + ')'); console.log('   🔀 Branches:', total.branches.pct + '%', '(' + total.branches.covered + '/' + total.branches.total + ')'); console.log('   ⚡ Functions:', total.functions.pct + '%', '(' + total.functions.covered + '/' + total.functions.total + ')');" || echo '   ⚠️  Coverage data not generated (due to test failures)')
